title: Explore Santa Monica : Hotel Carmel
inclusions_evidence: Includes 3 nights at Hotel Carmel~ Per Person, from $834
A compulsory resort fee of USD$23 plus taxes per room per day is payable direct to hotel on check-in.

other.notes: Resort fee is payable directly to the hotel.

reasoning: The travel agency deal is significantly cheaper than the DIY option when considering the total costs, including the resort fee.
